Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored the first competitive goal in two years
Igor Matanovic fired a first-time finish past goalkeeper Craig Gordon
Andrej Kramaric headed the home side in front
Che Adams saw a 95th minute equaliser ruled out by VAR
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke says ‘disappointment is massive’ as Scotland denied at the death
Scotland now have their longest winless run in competitive matches in their history
They’ve also lost four consecutive games for the first time since October 2019
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland have lost all three of their games in the competition ahead of the visit of Portugal on Tuesday
Steve Clarke’s side played well in parts, though they lacked the required quality in the final third and were guilty of falling asleep for the goals they conceded
The visitors had a last-gasp equaliser ruled out by VAR as they lost to Croatia
